!Giant's Servant Hadel: Einhasad said that after the spirit of rebirth Germunkusa will be in the Forest of the Dead. Monsters will try to capture the wreckage of his hands. Urgently go to the Forest of the Dead * and * Collect all the pieces of hands Germunkusa. Purpose of hunting: * Corrupt Guardsman *, * Corrupted Knight *, Resurrected Knight * and * Vampire Warrior *.
